Articles.Content:
I\'m looking for a space plane that:

A) gets into kerbin orbit

gets into munar orbit

C) lands on the mun

D) lands back on kerbin

I want it to use stock* parts.

*I never use the forums so I\'m not quite sure of the lingo but I believe stock is the term for vanilla (no mods) ksp

If u know of anything that would be amazing and greatly appreciated!
Geb\'s Archer Mk2 is, I believe, a stock Kerbin-Mun-Kerbin spaceplane.

Geb\'s Archer Mk2 is, I believe, a stock Kerbin-Mun-Kerbin spaceplane.

Hm... I can\'t seem to find that... Is it on these forums?

EDIT: nevermind I\'m just an idiot... Need to go the the ksp home and then search... *facepalm*
